name: Shared genes with published papers
author: Seth Barribeau
description: Differentially expressed genes under WNV (Sham_C.Sham_WNV) and JEV (Sham_C.Sham_JEV) infection in this study, and in the papers by Bartholomay et al 2010, Pradakar et al 2015, and Shin et al 2014.
source: Labs of Marcus Blagrove and Seth Barribeau (University of Liverpool)
